text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased faults for CloudWatch Logs APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. Log events and metrics may be delayed. Alarms may transition into "INSUFFICIENT_DATA" state if set on delayed metrics.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates and Latencies>
We are investigating elevated PutRecord API latencies and faults for Kinesis Data Streams in the US-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We can confirm increased faults for CloudWatch Logs APIs and some delayed log events in the US-WEST-2 Region. We are actively working to resolve the issue.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates and Latencies>
We can confirm elevated latencies and faults for Kinesis Data Streams PutRecord API in the US-WEST-2 Region. We are actively working to resolve the issue.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We can confirm partial recovery of API faults and reduced delay of log events in the US-WEST-2 Region. We have identified the root cause and are actively working to resolve the issue.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates and Latencies>
We can confirm partial recovery of faults for Kinesis Data Streams PutRecord API in the US-WEST-2 Region. We have identified the root cause and are actively working to resolve the issue.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 5:56 PM and 10:15 PM PDT, some customers experienced increased delays for CloudWatch log events in the US-WEST-2 Region. Metrics filtered from those log events were delayed, and CloudWatch alarms on delayed metrics may have transitioned into INSUFFICIENT_DATA state. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates and Latencies>
Between 5:56 PM and 10:15 PM PDT we experienced increased API latencies and error rates in the US-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
